text: dongseolo gogaeleul dollineun geos-ijinjeonghan sin-ang-i aneogeoneul jinjeonghan sin-ang-ilan hananimgwa naesewa cheonsadeul gwa seongseodeulgwa seonjijadeul-eul midgo ha nanim-eul wihaeseo gakkaun chinjideul-ege goadeul-ege gananhan salamdeul-ege yeo biga tteol-eojin yeohaengja-ege gugeolhaneun jawa noyeleul haebangsi kyeojun ja-ege yebaeleul deuligo iseullamseleul naemyeo yagsog-eul haess-eulttaeneun yagsog-eul ihaenghago gotong-gwa yeoggyeong-eseoneun chamgo innaehaneun geos-i jinjeonghan jeong-uiui gil-imyeo ideul iyamallo jinsilhage saneun uiloun salamdeul-ila
